scripts.version: node -e "const fs = require('fs'); const updateVersion = (file, versionPath) => { let json = JSON.parse(fs.readFileSync(file, 'utf-8')); let versionParts = versionPath.split('.'); let version = versionParts.reduce((o, k) => o[k], json); let [major, minor, patch] = version.split('.').map(Number); version = [(major + 1), 0, 0].join('.'); versionParts.reduce((o, k, i, a) => i === a.length - 1 ? o[k] = version : o[k], json); fs.writeFileSync(file, JSON.stringify(json, null, 2)); }; updateVersion('./package.json', 'version'); updateVersion('./app.json', 'expo.version');"
scripts.build:eas:development:android: npm run version && eas build --profile development --platform android
scripts.build:eas:development:ios: npm run version && eas build --profile development --platform ios
scripts.build:eas:development: npm run version && eas build --profile development --platform all
scripts.build:eas:apk:android: npm run version && eas build --profile local --platform android
scripts.build:eas:apk:ios: npm run version && eas build --profile local --platform ios
scripts.build:eas:apk: npm run version && eas build --profile local --platform all
scripts.build:eas:preview: npm run version && eas build --profile preview --platform all
scripts.build:eas:preview:ios: npm run version && eas build --profile preview --platform ios
scripts.build:eas:preview:android: npm run version && eas build --profile preview --platform android
scripts.build:eas:production: npm run version && eas build --profile production --platform all
scripts.build:eas:production:ios: npm run version && eas build --profile production --platform ios
scripts.build:eas:production:android: npm run version && eas build --profile production --platform android
scripts.android:prodev: expo prebuild && cd android && ./gradlew assembleRelease && ./gradlew assembleDebug
scripts.core:solo: cd core/proc/solo && rimraf input output && python Script_1.py && python Script_2.py && python Script_3.py && python Script_4.py && python Script_5.py && python Script_6.py
scripts.renew: rimraf node_modules android ios .expo server/node_modules server/dist && yarn install && yarn install --cwd server
scripts.clean: rimraf node_modules android ios .expo server/node_modules server/dist
